âš ï¸ **This type is _unstable_ and may change significantly in a way that the data won't be backwards compatible.**
JSON-encoded shader parameter metadata for custom rendering.

Describes uniform parameters, their types, and source entity paths for
data binding. Used alongside [`components.ShaderSource`](https://rerun.io/docs/reference/types/components/shader_source) to configure custom shaders.

The JSON schema supports `uniforms` (scalar/vector values) and `textures`
(2D/3D texture bindings), each with a `source` field pointing to the entity
path where the data should be queried.

## Rerun datatype
[`Utf8`](../datatypes/utf8.md)


## Arrow datatype
```
utf8
```
